attributes.action: Rethink the removal of the 10% income tax Band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I emplore the prime minister to rethink the 10% income tax band removal as it affects some of the lower paid and lower income groups such as myself who have taken early retirement on a modest pension and whos icome will now be reduced.Very little thought went in to this decision  by someone who seems far removed from reality

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
